name: Create LionDesk contacts from Google Sheets when triggered by a Webhook
description: Every time a custom webhook is triggered, Make will automatically use the email output from the webhook to add a new row to a Google Sheet. It will then validate that email address using ZeroBounce. If the email status is "valid" it will look that person up with Clearbit and create a new contact in LionDesk. It will also update the Google Sheet  row with the new data.
